newsitem.title: USA: IMR gets Fleming Cos Year 2000 contract.
newsitem.headline: IMR gets Fleming Cos Year 2000 contract.

text.p: Information Management Resources Inc said Wednesday that it has been awarded a contract by Fleming Cos Inc to find and fix any Fleming computer problems related to the millennium bug.
Financial details of the deal were not disclosed.

Many older computers and software programs, unable to process two-digit dates correctly after December 31, 1999, could crash on January 1, 2000, while many other will think the date is January 1, 1900.
Those firms must dedicate resources or hire other firms to mine through millions of lines of code to correct the problem.
